Uses of Interface
com.software.reuze.mp_Factor

  • Packages that use mp_Factor 
    Package Description
    com.software.reuze  

    • Uses of mp_Factor in com.software.reuze

      Classes in com.software.reuze that implement mp_Factor 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  mp_ProbabilityTable
      A Utility Class for associating values with a set of finite Random Variables.
      Methods in com.software.reuze that return mp_Factor 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      mp_Factor mp_i_DistributionConditionalTable.getFactorFor(mp_PropositionTermOpsAssignment... evidence)
      Construct a Factor consisting of the Random Variables from the Conditional Probability Table that are not part of the evidence (see AIMA3e pg.
      mp_Factor mp_DistributionConditionalTable.getFactorFor(mp_PropositionTermOpsAssignment... evidence) 
      mp_Factor mp_ProbabilityTable.pointwiseProduct(mp_Factor multiplier) 
      mp_Factor mp_Factor.pointwiseProduct(mp_Factor multiplier)
      Pointwise multiplication of this Factor by a given multiplier, creating a new Factor representing the product of the two.

      see: AIMA3e Figure 14.10 page 527.

      Note: Default Factor multiplication is not commutative.
      mp_Factor mp_ProbabilityTable.pointwiseProductPOS(mp_Factor multiplier, mp_i_RandomVariable... prodVarOrder) 
      mp_Factor mp_Factor.pointwiseProductPOS(mp_Factor multiplier, mp_i_RandomVariable... prodVarOrder)
      Pointwise Multiplication - Product Order Specified (POS).

      see: AIMA3e Figure 14.10 page 527.

      Pointwise multiplication of this Factor by a given multiplier, creating a new Factor representing the product of the two.
      mp_Factor mp_Factor.sumOut(mp_i_RandomVariable... vars)
      Sum out the provided variables from this Factor creating a new Factor of the remaining variables with their values updated with the summed out random variables.

      see: AIMA3e page 527.
